record.dc:title: 161BY13 Ledford Island, Bradley County, Tennessee. Burial 16BY112, a mature male. Part of skull lies south of main portion. Square 8R2. Direction South.
record.wpa:narrative: Mature male in good condition, extended on back with head to west. Pit from plowzone filled with rather dark mixed clay and humus. Pit cuts into pit of 16BY117. Bones rest 0.2' above bottom of pit. Skull face up, but tipped back, chin highest. Part of skull lies to right of main part of skull. Left shoulder higher but burial not on side. Left wrist and hand under pelvis. Left ilium higher than right. Burial does not seem disturbed as all bones are in articulation. Perhaps original deposition may account for position. Feet somewhat scattered, apparently propped at end of pit. Pit rectangular at level of bones.
